climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: KEY INGREDIENTS FOR RADIANT SKIN: Enriched with Niacinamide, Beta-Glucan and Quillaja Saponaria Bark Extract, our gel facial cleanser goes beyond cleansing. Enjoy the benefits of hydration, soothing properties, and a boost in overall skin health

ALL SKIN TYPES: Formulated for various skin types, our gel hydrating cleanser is a versatile addition to any skin care routine. Whether you have dry, sensitive, normal, combination or even acne prone skin
UNISEX SKINCARE: This fragrance-free women's and men's face wash is designed to support healthier skin for every person, regardless of gender

ALL-AGE INCLUSIVITY: Our foaming facial cleanser is suitable for cleansing face washens combating acne, adults seeking daily skincare maintenance, and older individuals in need of gentle yet effective cleansing
MINDFULLY FORMULATED: Our gentle face cleanser is alcohol-free, dye-free, paraben-free, and soap-free and cruelty-free approach ensures a clean and comfortable skincare routine
body.description: Introducing Tailorford's Men's and Women's Face Wash. Our gentle face cleansers combines the power of Niacinamide (Vitamin B3) and other natural antioxidant to deep cleanse, improve elasticity without over drying or stripping your skin of its natural oils. Tailorford's face cleanser is perfect for both men and women, catering to all skin types, from dry and sensitive to oily and combination. With this gentle foaming face wash and it's fragrance-free composition, this cleanser is ideal for daily use, offering a refreshing shower experience for kids, teens and adults

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's the best!
reviews.reviewText: I am in my sixties and have sensitive skin. I tried other brands of gel facewash that dried my skin out horribly and gave me more acne than I had in my teens. Fortunately I found Tailorford! It cleans well, easy to rinse off, and got rid of the acne problem. It actually does minimize the appearance of your pores. My skin looks and feels fantastic and I haven't yet tried their moisturizer. I will definitely be buying Tailorford facewash again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves my face feeling clean and best value for the price
reviews.reviewText: I have tried different face washes over the years and I will continue to use the Tailorford Face Wash. I have used the face wash daily for the past two weeks. This face wash has a pleasant and mild citrus scent which is a huge plus. It lathers nicely and I can feel how much cleaner my face is after I use it.My skin reacted to other skin care products in the past but this face wash doesn’t dry out my skin at all. I’ve been using this face wash once in the morning and once at night, followed by the Tailorford moisturizer. My skin is glowing and my friends have complimented how much better my skin looks vs my previous skin care routine. I highly recommend checking out the moisturizer too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars too much comes out at a time
reviews.reviewText: The cleaner is very thin and a lot comes out when you open the lid. You have to be very careful when getting the liquid out and not squeeze the bottle. If you do squeeze the bottle then a lot of liquid comes out and you only need to use a little. I use this if I only want a light cleaning and to moisturize my face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice face wash
reviews.reviewText: A little goes a long way, sadly didn’t realize has liquid it was and a lot of it poured out when I opened it and tried to squeeze some out. Makes my face feel really smooth and fresh, the scent is kind of neutral. I’d buy it again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saw in tiktok
reviews.reviewText: This is my second purchase for my son. He loves it & has never asked for a specific brand in anything. Saw a young man review this on tiktok before the had the tiktok shop so he wasn’t making money off or. Just raved on how well it cleared up his skin.My son says the same thing. Loves how nice his skin feels since using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars clean and hydrated
reviews.reviewText: I am using Tailorford face wash in the morning everyday to replace the bar soap. This face wash leaves my face feeling clean and hydrated and soft. I am so completely satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my second time buying the face wash and i love it. It leaves my face feeling super fresh after. I tend to like more of foaming cleansers and this is a great in between. Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New favorite brand of skincare!
reviews.reviewText: This is my third bottle of this product and I still have nothing but praise :)
